#summary Description of an ApolloService

= Introduction =

An ApolloService is a central service that hosts at least one SimulatorService.  The ApolloService can optionally host one or more [VisualizerService VisualizerServices].

End User Applications interoperate with the registered [SimulatorService SimulatorServices] and [VisualizerService VisualizerServices] through calls to the ApolloService.

The methods of this service are documented [ApolloServiceInterfaceDocumentation here].
